page.title: 08COMMUNITY CENTRES
page.content: Community centres became a notable feature in our society after World war II.They replaced the pre-war institutes in particular in the mining areas.In Berwick there are four community centres:Highfields,Berwick, Highcliffe, Prior Park.These centres are paid for by the Local Authority and the local residents. Activities at Berwick centre include: chess club floral art embroidery open university Spittal variety Berwick opera table tennis arts club camera club Boys' Brigade Brownies cancer campaign Darby and Joan club blind and handicapped club St.John's ambulance Young Farmers The Jubilee and Prior Park Centres are licensed.There are concerts, keep fit classes, indoor bowls, toddlers' groups and senior citizen groups each week.
